__e: -I know it was wrong of me.
Look, I'm sorry. I should have stayed out of it. You were right.
Every day, we face questions of right and wrong and decisions about whether to take action or stay out of the game.
Listen, I'm happy anytime a situation gets resolved peacefully, but the next time, I'd appreciate it if you guys just got out of the way and let me and my men do our job.
They told me to butt out and let them handle their business.
And you know, maybe things would be better for him if we all just cleared out and really let him focus.
